characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If you have any Callidus Assassins in your army, then during the first battle round you must roll a dice each time your opponent spends Command Points (CPs) to use a Stratagem. On a 4+, your opponent must spend one extra CP to use that Stratagem, or else it has no effect (the CPs spend so far are lost). This ability cannot affect Stratagems used 'before the battle begins'.
